name: Grocery delivery — add to cart
description:
Present coffee to the creator ☕️


In this shot, I solved several problems of many home delivery applications at once. 


1. Constant jumping from catalog to product card and back again.


 There's no need to go back again. If you've decided on a category, you can view detailed information and switch to the next product with a simple swipe. It's as easy as flipping through stories on Instagram.


2. Low conversion to cart and checkout. 


The animation of adding a product to cart tells you where things stack up.

And the clear free shipping counter motivates checkout well.
